casebody.data:
2002-0038 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Marcus L. PITTMAN, III. No. 2002-K-0038. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Pittman, Marcus L. Ill; — Defendant; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of St. Tammany, 22nd Judicial District Court Div. G, No. 325,059; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 KW 1674.

Denied.
